name: Statue of Senshin
description:
Team Name: Microlight Studios

Gameplay Instructions:

WASD to move

Left Shift to sprint while swimming

Left Ctrl to swim down

E to interact while looking at interactables or portals

Game Objective:

Travel between parallel cities through, collect the fragments, and repair the Statue of Senshin!

Content created before the jam:

Ultra Dynamic Sky

Easy Swim

Quixel Megascans assets and a Metahuman were created/downloaded and used within the time frame.

Star sky 8k texture from NASA

Everything else was created within the week time frame.

Link to Gameplay Footage:

Made with Unreal Engine 5.0.3
